Tweets.Text: Currently flying over Greenland, #IceBridge is measuring ice that's melted over the summer from the ice sheet:
Spacecraft’s eye view…this composite of 6 @CassiniSaturn images show movement of Saturn’s ocean moon Enceladus:
Composed tweets will only be saved until the page until a new session is made. Composed tweets are stored in local storage. Any changes will be reset on page refresh.
Did you know my pet snail Gary can solve differential equations? He sure can! If only he had opposable thumbs, he could show you...
They say you shouldn’t judge a book by its cover.  But I think they need to make an exception for book cover contest judges!
If I had suction cups like Squidward, I’d be climbing up the walls!  But in a good way.
Squidward told me to “get a clue” … and I surely will because today is Tuesday, and Tuesday is Clues Day!
